attributes.action: Consider reinstating the death penalty for  sexual crimes and murder for anyone who harms a child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe in my heart that the death penalty needs to be reinstated for sexual crimes and murder for anyone who commits these crimes against a child. Children are gifts from God, our nations future and should be protected at any cost. I think the case of Madeleine McCann highlights this more than ever and this goverment needs to do a lot more than chemical castrations to protect children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
